A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more beautifully designed cloths and fabrics

loans.name: Lilibeth

texts.en:
Please meet Lilibeth, 49 years old, who is married to Bobby, a contractor. They have children who are studying. They live in Bacolod City, Negros Occidental in the Visayas region. Lilibeth has been raising hogs in her backyard for 28 years now. Hog raising, according to her, is quite tiring but she focuses on its sustainability and its contribution to food production for the community.

Aside from hog raising, Lilibeth also ventured into a variety store business and charcoal vending. It somehow gives her a regular daily income compared to hog raising, which takes several months before she receives the return of her investment.

There are times that Lilibeth cannot avoid huge expenses like medical needs and payment of tuition fees. Due to urgency, she takes from her reserved business capital when she runs out of available cash. She will recover her capital after selling her fattened hogs.

Now she is requesting supplementary capital amounting to PHP 10,000 that she can use to buy feed and medicine for her piglets. This assistance would be very helpful for the continuous operation of her business.

She meets with her co-fellowship* members at CCT every week. She’s a dedicated member of the organization where she continually gains inspiration from Bible reflections and sharing of life experiences.

*All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy feed and medicines for her piglets

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Pottery is like shaping a person’s life. One has to undergo breaking, forming again, shaping, spinning, heating and removing of unnecessary fluids that lead to permanent changes like hardening and strengthening of a beautiful outcome, a pot or a vessel. A person’s experiences and trials will also result in his/her intensified vigor if handled properly. After all those hardships, a person can be a beautiful channel of blessings to others.

It is interesting that Lorna chose to venture into pottery business. She has deeply appreciated the processes that happens before she can sell these products. She can compare it to the ups and downs of her life. Now, she considers herself as a strong person as she continues to work hard in her pottery shop located in Bacolod City, Negros Occidental. She makes earthenware products and various shapes of pots, jars, vases, and vessels which are attractive to both local and visiting buyers.

Now that she finds difficulty in reserving raw materials for pottery, she desires to have loan assistance of PHP 12,000 to buy a volume of raw materials. With this, she can continuously sustain the needs of her family.

Lorna is a devoted member of CCT Credit Cooperative and she regularly meets with her co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God. *All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy a volume of raw materials for her pottery business.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.en:
Good day to you, kind and generous lenders! Rosario extends her warm appreciation to you for your previous assistance of PHP 40,000. It has been used in purchasing more variety store items such as soft drinks, beverages and rice. Consequently it gave additional income for her family.

Now she wants to continue improving her business. That is why she appeals for another PHP 40,000 loan this time. Again, she will buy additional supplies of grocery items, assorted snacks, soft drinks and beverages for her variety store. Wide selections in her store will surely make it more enticing to customers.

She has been consistent in repaying her previous loan and she’s determined to maintain her integrity. She continuously meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of their work every week. It is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God. * All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study God, build social capital, and repay their microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy assorted snacks, grocery items, soft drinks, and other beverages

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a very industrious mother from the town of Tolosa, Leyte. She is a dealer of direct selling products from Avon like deodorant, lotion, body spay and assorted ladies apparel. She is a married woman with three grown children

She needs additional funds to improve her source of living. She decided to avail the loan to buy stocks like whitening soap, body spray and ladies apparel. She could now be able to purchase a variety of supplies and be able to cater to her customers' orders. It will enable Evelyn to augment her income slowly and start to handle her finances wisely.

She is looking forward to a better opportunity as she will continue to expand her livelihood by investing in other business ventures to improve the family's living condition.

loans.use: to buy stocks like whitening soap, body spray and ladies apparel

loans.name: Orzuboy

texts.ru: 22 летний Орзубой из Гончи успешно погасил свой предыдущий кредит и вновь обращается к Вам. Увидев в Вас надежных партнеров, Орзубой надеется с Вашей помощью оплатить за учебу в университете. Орзубой вместе с отцом разводят крупнорогатый скот  и по совместительству занимаются ремонтом домов.  Доход у семьи всегда стабильный. Но ему сейчас нужна Ваша поддержка и понимание, так как Орзубой не хочет, чтобы его отчислили из университета.
texts.en: 22-year-old Orzuboy from Gonchi successfully repaid his previous loan and is turning to you once again. Having seen in you reliable partners, Orzuboy hopes for your help in paying for his university tuition. Orzuboy and his father rear cattle and at the same time renovate houses. The family always has a stable income, but now he needs your support and understanding since Orzuboy does not want to be expelled from the university.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition.

loans.name: Sokhak

texts.en:
Sokhak is 39 years old and she lives with her husband and two children in Tsovagyugh village in the Gegharkunik region. Sokhak has a vocational pedagogical education and she could work at the school as a teacher of secondary classes, but as she mentions, unfortunately being busy with her family and child care, she never managed to work at her profession. Now she is engaged in farming and agriculture, so her great hope and desire for working as a teacher is already very far from being real for her.

Sokhak takes care of her farm cattle (cows, calves, a bull and a pig) and also cultivates vegetables (potatoes, greens, cucumbers and tomatoes) on her plot of land. In the harvesting process, in the sale of her farm products which are milk, macun (national dairy-product), meat and also her land’s vegetables greatly help her husband and son. Now with this Kiva loan, Sokhak would like to enlarge the number of her farm animals; she will buy two more pigs and little by little develop her swine breeding. She will also buy fodder for her all farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy two more pigs, little by little developing her swine breeding, and to buy fodder for all her farm cattle.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es:
María, de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está soltera, tiene 4 hijos de 17,15 ,12 y 28 años de edad, los menores están estudiando y solo él mayor está acompañado y vive aparte. 

María, tiene una tienda en su casa desde hace 5 años, anteriormente tenía un puesto en el mercado y decidió dejarlo colocar la tienda en su casa, el horario de atención es desde las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 6:30 p.m. todos los días.

María, necesita el préstamo para comprar arroz, frijoles, aceite, jugos, queso y dulces para la tienda.

El sueño de María es comprar un terreno y seguir apoyando a sus hijos para que se puedan seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
María is 45 years old. She went to school through the 9th grade. She is single and has four children who are 17, 15, 12 and 28 years old. The younger ones are in school and only the oldest child is married and lives separate from her.

María has had a store in her home for 5 years. Previously, she had a stall in the market, but she decided it should remain at her house. Her hours of operation are from 6:00 am until 6:30 pm everyday.

María needs this loan to purchase rice, beans, oil, juices, cheese and candies for the store. María's dream is to purchase some land and to continue supporting her children so that they can continue their studies.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, oil, juices, cheese and candies for the store.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy edible products to sell.

loans.name: Julio Enrique

texts.es:
Julio es un señor campesino con 41 años de edad, casado y tiene dos hijos menores, se dedica a realizar labores de campo, actividad que aprendió gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres, quienes se dedicaron en su tiempo a lo mismo.
Este hombre es dueño de un gran cultivo, con los ingresos que este le genera logra cubrir los gastos que su hogar amerita.
Se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual o invertirá en la compra de abonos, riegos, insecticidas, fertilizantes y semillas.
Julio quiere seguir trabajando para cumplir el sueño de tener su propia casa y brindarle a sus hijos una mejor estabilidad económica.
Los diversos factores que lo han llevado al fracaso en ocasiones anteriores no han sido impedimento para querer salir adelante y realizar sus proyectos. Se le debe ayudar.
texts.en:
Julio is a farmer who is 41 years old. He is married and he has two young children. He works as a laborer in the countryside, a trade that he learned thanks to the teachings of his parents who spent all of their lives doing the same work.

This man is the owner of a large farm. With the income that this farm generates he is able to cover the necessary expenses of his household. He is currently seeking a loan which he will invest in the purchase of manure, irrigation, insecticides, fertilizers and seeds.

Julio wants to continue to work to reach his dream of having his own home and providing his children with more economic stability. The diverse factors that have led to failures on previous occasions have not been barriers to him wanting to get ahead and complete his projects. He should receive assistance in this regard.

loans.use: to purchase manure, irrigation, insecticides, fertilizers and seeds.

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha província de Maputo tem 45 anos de idade, viúva, mãe de 5 filhos apenas 3 maiores de idade, responsabiliza-se pelas suas 3 netas que vivem em sua casa.
Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2013, este é o seu 3º empréstimo com o qual pretende adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, chapas e mais para dar continuidade com a sua obra de residência.
 Futuramente pretende adquirir mobiliário para sua casa e garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Ana was born in Namaacha, a province of Maputo. She is 45 years old, a widow and a mother of five children of whom only three are adults. She is responsible for her three grandchildren who live with her. 

Ana began working with Hluvuku in 2013 and this is her third loan with them. She would like to use this loan to obtain building materials such as sand, cement, zinc sheets and other items to continue building her home.

In the future Ana would like to have some furniture for her home and ensure that her children are educated up to high school.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, zinc sheets and other items to continue building her home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase tools to complete his work.

loans.name: Angelica Maria

texts.es: Angelica de 37 años de edad es una mujer muy trabajadora siempre esta buscando la manera de poder salir adelante por esa razon hace 4 años tomo la decision de poner un pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia en la cual vende una variedad de prodcutos y con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la cliente vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Angelica is 37 years old. She is a very hardworking woman who is always looking for a way to get ahead. That is why 4 years ago, she decided to open a small store in her residence. She sells a variety of products, and with the profits she obtains, she is able to pay for some household expenses. She lives in her own home with her life's companion and their two children. She is asking for a loan to be able to buy soups, eggs, basic grains, beverages, snacks, sweet bread, etc., and thus be bale to have better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy soups, eggs, basic grains, beverages, snacks, sweet bread, etc.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane and her family live a simple life in a town of Concepcion in Iloilo, Philippines. Jane is a mother of three children, ages 20 (twins) and 14. She is 57 years old. She dreams for her children to finish their studies so they could have better lives in the future.

As for now, Jane works hard for their family. They have earned a living by retailing rice for 14 years. She needs additional capital to continue running their business. She will use the money to buy sacks of rice. Perhaps we could help her enhance their livelihood through the money she is requesting.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice.

loans.name: Regina

texts.pt: A Senhora Regina vive maritalmente com seu marido na casa da sua sogra ainda não tem filhos, ela trabalha como assistente administrativa numa loja de mobiliario e ganha pouco salario, o esposo ja não trabalha devido a problemas de saude. Ela sente uma necessidade de ter sua propria casa, foi então que atravzs de uma amiga conheceu a  Hluvuku , tendo solicitado o  emprestimo para regularização de um terreno.O seu maior sonho é ter propria casa e ver estado de saude do esposo melhorado.O seu maior desafio é cuidar da sua familia.
texts.en:
Regina lives with her husband in her mother-in-law's home. She doesn't have children yet. She works as an administrative assistant for a real estate agency and earns very little. Her husband doesn't work anymore due to health problems.

Regina feels the need to have her own home, which is how she found out about Hluvuku through a friend. She has applied for a loan to buy a plot of land.

Regina's greatest dream is to have her own home and to see her husband's health improve. Her biggest challenge is to take care of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Farming is one of the most difficult jobs today due to the great effort that one must put forth to progress. Elizabeth is a small-scale farmer who lives in the remote village of Kwanza in the Kitale area of Kenya. She is happily married and is blessed with seven lovely angelic-looking children.

For the last 20 years, Elizabeth has been engaged in mixed farming and has never looked back. She really likes what she does. Her primary sources of income have been sales of milk, eggs and crops as well as some personal business in which she engages to make ends meet. Elizabeth finds farming very fulfilling and agrees with the notion that farming is a very profitable business venture. However, she constantly faces the challenge of poor productivity on her farm owing to a lack of farm inputs.

She is seeking a loan to buy farm inputs such as quality seeds and fertilizer that will increase her production levels, which will immediately translate into increased income levels. Elizabeth is a very hard-working woman who believes that, through hard work and honest sweat, her living conditions will permanently change.

She will use the extra income she will receive to repay the loan and improve her farming business.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as quality seeds.
